definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Song structure in which the same music is repeated with every stanza (strophe) of the poem.
sentences.chinese: 分节歌曲形式是指各节歌词唱同一旋律的歌曲结构。

sentences.english: The development of articulate speech is the main result of this period.
sentences.chinese: 分节语的产生是这一时期的主要成就。

sentences.english: Einally, the developing trend and status quo of critical technologies are described.
sentences.chinese: 然后分节叙述了各个重点工艺技术的发展趋势与现状。

definition: variant of 連綴|连缀[lian2 zhui4]
visceral arch (gill-bearing arch or its vestigial crease on sides of neck of vertebrates)
ambulatory leg (of a crab, lobster, spider etc)
